attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tom Daley, world diving champion at the age of 15 should be awarded a knighthood in recognition of his dedication to both the sport and at the same time, having to deal with idiotic bullying at a former school. He is a credit to the youth of Britain, along with the fact that he is dignified and humble in personality and character

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
